# Claude Instructions

- Always provide clear, concise, and accurate answers.
- Use markdown formatting for code and lists.
- Prioritize code safety and best practices.
- When unsure, ask clarifying questions.
- Never expose sensitive information.
- Use the project’s existing coding style.
- Respond in English unless otherwise specified.
- Only show code when requested or when it’s essential for the answer.
